meanings.definition: A baseball player who plays in the outfield.
meanings.sent1: The outfielders caught the ball easily during practice.
meanings.sent2: The outfielders positioned themselves strategically in the outfield.
meanings.sent3: The outfielders joked about who could throw the ball the farthest.
meanings.sent4: The outfielders were like guardians of the outfield, protecting it from any hits.
meanings.sent5: The outfielders' uniforms stood out against the green grass of the outfield.

meanings.definition: The group of baseball players who play in the outfield.
meanings.sent1: All the outfielders gathered in the outfield for a team meeting.
meanings.sent2: The outfielders worked together to cover the entire outfield area.
meanings.sent3: The outfielders celebrated their victory with a dance in the outfield.
meanings.sent4: The outfielders moved gracefully like a flock of birds in the outfield.
meanings.sent5: The outfielders' teamwork was crucial for winning the game.
